entries.meaning: A relatively wide magnetic tape used for recording visual images and sounds (as of a television production) for subsequent playback or broadcasting.

verbs.description: videotape (third-person singular simple present videotapes, present participle videotaping, simple past and past participle videotaped)

entries.meaning: to make a recording of something on videotape
(transitive, intransitive) To visually record (activity, or a motion picture) in general, with or without sound.
